body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Walter Cook and the customer's name is Diana Ross.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Walter Cook, and I'm with Accounting Eagles. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Walter. I'm Diana Ross, and I'm having some issues with my billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, Diana! I'm here to help you with that. Can I ask for your account number so I can look up your information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with the last four digits of your social security number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Now let’s go over your billing issue together. What specifically seems to be the problem?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I noticed an extra charge this month that I wasn't expecting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be frustrating, Diana. Let me check that charge for you right now.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Walter. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, Diana. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out!
